localTimeZoneDate.description: Date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD where YYYY = year MM = month [01..12] DD = day [01..31].

localTimeZoneTime.description: Time formatted as hh:mm:ss where hh = hour [00..23] mm = minute [00..59] ss = seconds [00..59].

atDateTime.description: ISO 8601. Reflects the UTC time when the information was provided.
